content: {"locationId": "4695", "organizationId": "3937", "name": "Liz Murphy Open Hand Pantry", "address1": "16 Ashland Street", "address2": "", "city": "Haverhill", "state": "MA", "zipCode": "01830", "country": null, "phone": "978-372-0260", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "42.78109", "longitude": "-71.07553", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "CITY:  Groveland MA, Haverhill MA", "languages": "English, French, Spanish", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "The Liz Murphy Open Hand Pantry is sponsored by St Gabriel the Archangel Parish (St. James and St John the Baptist Catholic Churches).  We are located in the basement of the Unitarian Universalist church located at 16 Ashland Street.  Street parking is available or across the street in a small Unitarian Universalist parking lot.  Clients are asked to NOT park in the office parking lot located next door.", "notes": "New clients will receive a Pantry ID card (barcode) and two cloth bags.  Both are required each Tuesday you shop.  We do not offer additional bags, so please bring the bags we provided or others.   Clients are assigned a Green or Orange ID Card and allowed to shop every other week. Dates for your weeks' shopping will be provided.  ", "contactName": "Therese Mohay", "contactPhone": "978-372-0260", "contactEmail": "stjamesohp@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, Grocery / Client Choice, Indoor Service, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "Dairy Free, Gluten Free, Nut Free", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Eggs, Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 33, "regionName": "Merrimack Valley Food Bank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "1134b54c-59ea-435d-95c7-290215b83d59.png", "website": "https://mvfb.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Tuesday 4:00 PM-7:00 PM (New clients are asked to come no later than 6:15 to allow for the registration process and ample time to shop.  Doors lock promptly at 7:00PM)"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
